headline: One of these two marmosets stuck out her tongue, and you will be shocked to discover what happened next!
description: This is a story of great marmoset import, bringing to light facets of the marmoset condition that have staggering implications for all marmosets.

headline: You won't believe which celebrity marmoset got brushed!
description: This article delves deeply into the phenomenon of marmoset brushing, and explores the human toothbrush brands favored by marmosets of note.

headline: Bananas!  That's what you'll think when you hear about this tasty marmoset treat.  But how many are too many?
description: This article presents an op-ed view on the popular and controversial subject of bananas.

headline: Think ice cream is just for homo sapiens?  You've got another cone coming!
description: This story presents an exploration of the astounding popularity of ice cream in discerning marmoset circles.

headline: Shocking celebrity marmoset reveal!
description: This story is shameless click-bait, obviously, but you know you want to read it.

headline: You'll go ape over this hipster marmoset's mar-moustache!
description: Here we have a society piece about the popularity of extravagant facial hair among marmoset hipsters.

headline: Ever get attacked by a weasel?  Here is what you must know about camouflage.
description: By reading this article, you can find out how to match your individual plumage to your background and avoid predation.

headline: Sassy!  This famous marmoset says "all those other monkeys can look at my tongue!"
description: This is a personality-driven piece about everyone's favorite irascible marmoset raconteur.

headline: What the top docs say about how to stay young and healthy when you're a marmoset.
description: This is a pseudo-informational piece about health and diet.

headline: Human fingers--we all love them, but where have they been?
description: This story explores the pros and cons of using human fingers as marmoset perches and climbing structures.
